channel.title: Schedule on Digital Youth Challenge Kapiti 2017
channel.description: Recent content in Schedule on Digital Youth Challenge Kapiti 2017

item.title: Mentor Workshop
item.description: Agenda Introduction Values / Code of Conduct Roles (Coach / Subject Matter Expert) Admin Location: Whitireia Back

item.title: Startup Weekend Wellington
item.description: Thinking of being a mentor or signed up as one? Stop by at Startup Weekend Wellington to get first hand experience of such an event. Relax and observe and take in the odd lesson. Click here for details Location: Whitireia Back

item.title: Open for Registrations
item.description: If you already know about the event and just want to register just Join the Challenge Back

item.title: Mentor Workshop
item.description: Agenda Lean Canvas Judging Criteria Location: Whitireia Back

item.title: Introduction Evening
item.description: Program Meet & Greet Mentor Introduction Program Discussion Elevator Pitch Resources Mentors Critical Thinking LeanStack LeanCanvas Zoom Location: KCDC Chambers Back

item.title: Participant Workshop - Problem Statement
item.description: Program What problem are you solving? Who has this problem? How are people / organisations affected by this problem? Pitch Practice Resources Location: Whitireia Back

item.title: Video Check In - Market Analysis
item.description: Program What other options are out there to solve the problem you’ve identified? How big is your market ( PAM > TAM > SAM > SOM ) Location: Online Resources Back

item.title: Participant Workshop - Unique Value Proposition
item.description: Program How is your solution different from existing solutions? Why is yours better? How does this matter to customers? Pitch Practice Resources Location: Whitireia Back

item.title: Video Check In - Relevance
item.description: Program Who are your customers? (Personas, Interview Results) How important is the problem you’re solving to your potential customers? Location: Online Resources Back

item.title: Participant Workshop - Channel Management
item.description: Program How do you reach your customers? What is your key message? How do you get from 0 > 10 > 100 > 1000 customers? Pitch Practice Resources Location: Whitireia Back

item.title: Startup Weekend Kapiti Finals
item.description: Come visit the Startup Weekend Kapiti to watch a wide range of teams in a 54 hr long, high energy competition. Relax and observe and take in the odd lesson. Details at http://kapiti.co Location: Whitireia Back

item.title: Video Check In - Unfair Advantage?
item.description: Program How to protect your business? Location: Online Resources Back

item.title: Participant Workshop - Financials
item.description: Program What does it cost to build and deliver your solution to the customer? What are customers prepared to pay for it? Pitch Practice Resources Location: Whitireia Back

item.title: Video Check In - Key Metrics?
item.description: Program How do you know you’re on track to success? Location: Online Resources Back

item.title: Final Pitch Practice
item.description: Program Deliver a perfect pitch Resolve outstanding issues Resources Location: Whitireia Back

item.title: Finale
item.description: Program LeanStack Zoom Location: KCDC Chambers Back
